alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:19PM MDT until June 21 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 818 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Forder, or 42 miles north of North La Junta, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported two inch hail ten miles west-southwest of Forder. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Forder and Wild Horse Point. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
